mapper.sql: goods_id, supplier_id, brand_id, goods_name, goods_code_suffix, is_sell_product, cost_price, goods_desc, store_account
mapper.insert:
insert into account_goods
goods_id,
supplier_id,
brand_id,
goods_name,
goods_code_suffix,
is_sell_product,
cost_price,
goods_desc,
store_account,
unit,
#{goodsId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{supplierId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{brandId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{goodsName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{goodsCodeSuffix,jdbcType=CHAR},
#{isSellProduct,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{costPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},

mapper.update:
update account_goods
supplier_id = #{supplierId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
brand_id = #{brandId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
goods_name = #{goodsName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
goods_code_suffix = #{goodsCodeSuffix,jdbcType=CHAR},
is_sell_product = #{isSellProduct,jdbcType=INTEGER},
cost_price = #{costPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
goods_desc = #{goodsDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
store_account = #{storeAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
unit = #{unit,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
is_deleted = #{isDeleted,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where goods_id = #{goodsId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update account_goods set supplier_id = #{supplierId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, brand_id = #{brandId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, goods_name = #{goodsName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, goods_code_suffix = #{goodsCodeSuffix,jdbcType=CHAR}, is_sell_product = #{isSellProduct,jdbcType=INTEGER}, cost_price = #{costPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, goods_desc = #{goodsDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, store_account = #{storeAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where goods_id = #{goodsId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select ag.goods_id, ag.supplier_id, ag.brand_id, ag.goods_name, ag.goods_code_suffix, ag.is_sell_product, ag.cost_price, ag.goods_desc, ag.store_account, si.supplier_name, gb.brand_name from account_goods ag left join supplier_info si on si.supplier_id = ag.supplier_id left join goods_brand gb on gb.brand_id = ag.brand_id where ag.store_account = #{storeAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and ag.is_sell_product = #{isSellProduct,jdbcType=INTEGER}
